parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, melancholic, dreamy, electric piano, soft drums, shimmering reverb
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Streetlights hum a fading tune / Neon ghosts dance beneath the moon / We were young and time was slow / Now the echoes barely show [chorus] I still see you in the static glow / A pixel heart we used to know / Rewind the tape but it’s all snow / Just a ghost in the afterglow [verse] Your voice lives on a cassette / Crackling words I can’t forget / Every click, every pause / A silent film without a cause [chorus] I still see you in the static glow / A pixel heart we used to know / Rewind the tape but it’s all snow / Just a ghost in the afterglow [bridge] The city breathes in monochrome / A hollow dial tone on the phone / If memories were fractal art / Would we ever drift apart? [outro] Frequencies fade to gray / The night eats our yesterday / But somewhere in the circuits’ hum / Our old song plays on…
